mapper.insert: insert into bbst_reply(bbst_reply_id, bbst_id, member_id, reply_cn, regdate, updatedate) values (bbst_reply_SEQ.nextval, #{bbstId}, #{memberId}, #{replyCn}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select r.*, m.name, m.img from bbst b, bbst_reply r, member m where b.bbst_id = r.bbst_id and r.member_id = m.member_id and r.bbst_reply_id = #{bbstReplyId}
mapper.update: update bbst_reply set reply_cn = #{replyCn}, updatedate = sysdate where bbst_reply_id = #{bbstReplyId}
mapper.select: select * from ( select /*+ index(r idx_bbst_reply) */ rownum rn, r.*, m.name, m.img from bbst b, bbst_reply r, member m where r.bbst_id = b.bbst_id and r.member_id = m.member_id and r.bbst_id = #{bbstId} and r.bbst_reply_id > 0 and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from bbst_reply where bbst_id = #{bbstId}

select /*+ index_desc (r bbst_reply_pk) */ rownum rn, b.cn_img, r.*, m.name from bbst b, bbst_reply r, member m where b.bbst_id = r.bbst_id(+) and r.member_id = m.member_id(+) and r.member_id = #{memberId} and r.bbst_reply_id > 0
select count(*) from bbst_reply where member_id = #{memberId}
